Subject: Sensitvity Analysis and Reaction Path Analysis

David,
I have recently downloaded the Fortran version of Cantera. So far I am 
impressed with the program and would like to congratulate you on 
producing this software. I notice in the Fortran manual that it should 
be possible to perform reaction path analyses with the current version 
of Cantera however I have not managed to locate the appropriate module 
for this. Any clues as to where I should look would be appreciated.

I understand that currently sensistivity analysis cannot be performed 
with Cantera, do you plan to add sensitivity analysis in the near 
future or are you focussing your development efforts in other areas?

Regards

Rob Tranter
Dept. Chemical Engineering
University of Illinois at Chicago
